pullrequest.title: Adding self collide and GUI method

content.raw:
A few tips:

* If there is no blank line after the bold line, the following line is printed next to the bold text
* You can use subheaders for these sections, for example use `##` before the text instead of `1)` + bold
* Some users might not be familiar with the model editor, so it could be interesting to give more context, by explaining that if you have a model already loaded in simulation, you can right-click it and choose `Edit model`
content.html:
A few tips:

  • If there is no blank line after the bold line, the following line is printed next to the bold text
  • You can use subheaders for these sections, for example use ## before the text instead of 1) + bold
  • Some users might not be familiar with the model editor, so it could be interesting to give more context, by explaining that if you have a model already loaded in simulation, you can right-click it and choose Edit model
